WorkItem.ClosedComment: No issue, just wishes for improvements.
WorkItem.Description:
When I created an HTML table to __MigraDoc table__ conversion, i found 2 issues:
1) no __inner table__ could be added to a cell easily (text-frames are too complex for this)
2) no auto __flow layout__ is available
3) __it's not possible to set the column or table width as percentage,__ f.e. Unit(30, UnitType.PageWidthPercentage) or Unit(30, UnitType.PageHeightPercentage)
WorkItem.Summary: Table - colum or table width in % or auto-size

Comments.Message:
Re 3: You know the width of a page in cm or in, so it's easy to calculate the column width for any percent value. It's easy to write a helper that does it. I wrote a helper that does something similar and I'll release it sooner or later on NuGet.
Re 2: MigraDoc could determine the column width automatically based on the contents of each column. But I don't like that idea. The application adds the contents, thus the application can decide better how the available page width will be distributed between columns.
Re 1: MigraDoc was designed to behave like Word. It was not designed to behave like HTML.

You call it "issues", I'd call it "wishes". I don't 1) or 2) becoming reality any time soon.
